expressions.translation: Pour aller plus loin avec ça

expressions.expression: We'll cross that bridge when we come to it

expressions.expression: A bird in the hand is worth two in the bush
expressions.translation: Un tiens vaut mieux que deux tu l'auras

expressions.expression: Bite off more than you can chew

expressions.translation: Tu es un serpent dans l'herbe

expressions.expression: Every cloud has a silver lining
expressions.translation: Après la pluie, le beau temps

expressions.translation: Donner le bénéfice du doute à quelqu'un

expressions.expression: Let the cat out of the bag

expressions.expression: Your guess is as good as mine

expressions.expression: Don't count your chickens before they hatch

expressions.expression: When in Rome, do as the Romans do
